about_the_game:
Donate a small amount of moola to 'Rat Room Games' in support of our young artists hard work on this game.
All money goes towards future art projects at the school and reimbursing the $100 Steam fee for the free game.

The donation unlocks a small minigame that can played on jeri's 3DS in room 202!

  • Collect cheese as a rat to increase score
  • Level up your Magnetism, Speed, and Multiplier by obtaining Grub Tokens
  • Avoid the rubber ducks or be swept away by Jeri's pool water

edit: As of June 2024, we have made back the money for the Steam fee :D Thanks everyone!
detailed_description:
Donate a small amount of moola to 'Rat Room Games' in support of our young artists hard work on this game.
All money goes towards future art projects at the school and reimbursing the $100 Steam fee for the free game.

The donation unlocks a small minigame that can played on jeri's 3DS in room 202!

  • Collect cheese as a rat to increase score
  • Level up your Magnetism, Speed, and Multiplier by obtaining Grub Tokens
  • Avoid the rubber ducks or be swept away by Jeri's pool water

edit: As of June 2024, we have made back the money for the Steam fee :D Thanks everyone!
legal_notice: Money donated is used to fund future Rat Room Game art projects at The Governor's School for the Arts
name: ELECTROBASIS - Donation
